Translations.Text: navu musa mattu harunarige al‌phur‌kan annu (satya – mithyagalannu pratyekisi tilisuva granthavannu) mattu satyanisthara palige jyoti hagu upadesavannu nididevu
kannare kanadeye tam'ma odeyanige anjuttiruvavaru hagu a antima ksanada kuritu jagrtaragiruvavarigagi
idu, navu ilisikottiruva samrd'dha bodhane. Nivu idannu tiraskarisuvira
i hinde navu ibrahimarige visesa vivekavannu nididdevu mattu a kuritu navu ballavaragiddevu
avaru tam'ma tandeyodane hagu tam'ma janangadavarodane, ‘‘nivu identaha vigrahagalannu nambikondu trptaragiruviri?’’ Endu kelidaru
avaru helidaru; nam'ma purvajaru avugalanne pujisuvudannu navu kandiddeve
avaru (ibrahim) helidaru; khanditavagiyu nivu mattu nim'ma purvajaru spastavagi tappu dariyalliruviri
avaru (janangadavaru) helidaru; nivenu nam'ma balige satyavannu tandiruvira? Athava nivu kevala tamase maduttiruvira
avaru helidaru; akasagala hagu bhumiya odeyanu hagu avugalige rupa nididavane nijavagi nim'ma odeyanu. Idakke nim'ma munde nane obba saksiyagiddene
allahanane, nivu illinda horatuhoda balika i nim'ma vigrahagala kuritante (enu madabekendu) nanu ondu yojane hakikondiddene
konege avaru avellavannu nuccunuru madibittaru. Adare janarella adara balige maralalendu doddadondannu bittu bittaru
avaru (uravaru), ‘‘nam'ma devarugalige higella madidavanu yaru? Avanu khandita akrami’’ endaru
Kelavaru, ‘‘ibrahim embobba yuvakanu avugala kuritu matanaduvudannu navu keliddeve’’ endaru
